text: "Pledging My Love" is a 1954 ballad by Johnny Ace. It went to number 17 in the United States after his death. It has been covered by other artists. It was played in the 1985 movie Back to the Future Category:1954 songs Category:1950s ballads Category:R&B; ballads Category:Bing Crosby songs Category:Elvis Presley songs Category:Diana Ross songs Category:Jerry Lee Lewis songs Category:Tom Jones (singer) songs Category:Marvin Gaye songs Category:Aaron Neville songs Category:Solomon Burke songs Category:Emmylou Harris songs Category:Percy Sledge songs Category:LaVern Baker songs Category:Teresa Brewer songs Category:Kitty Wells songs
title: Pledging My Love
